Slogan: Put your data on the Couch — it deserves a break.
Decaf-TS + CouchDB: the most relaxed stack in tech.
No stress, no schema — just smooth storage.
Sit back. Your queries just got simpler.
Declarative indexes. Because you have better things to do.
Query like it’s SQL. Relax like it’s NoSQL.
Skip the CRUD. Keep the couch.
No setup. No stress. No problem.
Database queries that feel like a nap in a hammock.
Where your data chills and your dev flow soars.
Let the indexes build themselves.
CouchDB: for developers who like to lean back.
Couch mode: ON. Query mode: AUTO.
Your backend’s comfy recliner.
Sleep better knowing your queries just work.
The database that won’t keep you up at night.
No caffeine needed when your queries write themselves.
From query to chill in 0.01s.
CRUD is so last decade. Welcome to Couch mode.
Decaf + Couch = backend bliss.
